title: thunderbird continua a chiedere conferma delle password degli account di posta anche se sono state correttamente memorizzate nel sistema "Gestione Password"
content:
Buongiorno,

rileviamo che il programma di posta Thunderbird continua a richiedere l'inserimento delle Passwords degli account di posta, anche se sono correttamente salvate nella sezione Gestione Passwords. La finestra che si apre avvisa della impossibilità di connettersi al server e chiede l'inserimento delle credenziali. Se viene ignorata, cliccando su annulla, la posta funziona regolarmente e i messaggi vengono comunque scaricati. Salvo dopo qualche minuto viene ripresentata la stessa finestra con lo stesso messaggio di errore e il campo per inserire le nuove credenziali. Anche reinserendo e salvando le PWS il problema si ripresenta uguale. C'è qualche soluzione? Utilizzo thuderbird da sempre e non ho mai avuto di questi problemi. Grazie, buona giornata

Edoardo
creator: pessina.assicurazioni

I have tried several different search and only CNN are not able to be found.

title: posta in arrivo in un unica cartella, perchè?
content:
Buongiorno, chiedo gentilmente vs parere, in thunderbird ultima versione, installato su win 7 32bit le mail in arrivo dai 3 account che utilizzo in pop3, mi vengono buttate in una sola cartella "posta in arrivo", mentre sugli altri 2 pc con la stessa versione di thunderbird ogni account ha le sue cartelle "posta in arrivo", "inviata" "cestino" ecc.

Ho notato che in cartelle locali mancano i 3 pallini o lineette per modificare impostazione visualizzazione (cartelle unificate ecc), ma anche se l'0pzione è presente in visualizza, non riesco a separare le mail in arrivo dei 3 account... ho controllato anche nelle singole impostazioni account, ma non trovo nessuna voce che mi permetta di modificare questa visualizzazione. Questo mi servirebbe perche sto passando in IMAP (ed anche qui caos..), e devo fare delle prove sui singoli account, (come ho fatto negli altri pc).

creator: aaronridge

title: Mozilla Thunderbird not receiving email!
content:
Hi all.

I have been using Mozilla Thunderbird for my business email on my desktop (Windows) for quite some time and all seemed to be working well until I recently lost my phone, installed email onto it (K-9 Mail as Thunderbird not available for Android) and on the same day all of a sudden I am no longer receiving email through Thunderbird on my desktop.

The error I get:

"Login to server imap.123-reg.co.uk with username (and my email address) failed". It then gives me an option to re-try or enter new password, which I have not changed, and it will not accept current password. All a bit bizarre really given it was working perfectly fine!

It seems I am able to send email still, though it tells me it has sent it but not put a copy into my sent items.

I spoke with my email host earlier and they didn't want to assist, cut me off half way through talking to me!

I would be really grateful for any assistance anyone can offer. I am not particularly techie but can follow instructions.

Thank you. Angela
creator: angela46

title: Contacts not working with Mac Contacts
content: This has been going on for quite awhile and I know you've had threads about it, but I thought I'd put in another to bring the issue to the forefront yet again. I'm running 102.8.0 and while I can see the name of my Mac OS X Address Book in Contacts, nothing appears in Thunderbird, despite there being probably 20,000 contacts in my Mac Contacts Address book. The only way to view contacts in TB, for years now, has been to run Cardbook. I'm wondering if this issue will ever get fixed? I see you are working on what you seem to think is a big deal with the toolbar for 115 but in reality unless you are paying attention looks pretty much like what is there now. So while you all think it's huge, it's minor. When will you do something major like getting this issue resolved. Just an FYI, I'm a regular contributor and I'd like to see this issue resolved before this toolbar thing that you all seem to be spending an inordinate amount of time on.
creator: chunnel

title: Problema connessione server uscita thunderbird
content: Salve, da un paio di giorni sto avendo problemi con Thunderbird in cui ho, già da tempo, configurati vari account di posta elettronica (tra cui Gmail, Libero, hotmail e server proprietari). Utilizzo la versione 102.8.0 (64 bit) e ho Avast come antivirus. Il problema riguarda le mail in uscita: provando a inviare un messaggio mi risulta l'errore "connessione server in uscita non riuscita" (vedere immagine allegata). Riesco a scaricare la posta (sia quella in entrata che in uscita) ma non a inviare mail. Ho provato a configurare l'account gmail ma mi dà sempre lo stesso errore. Stessa cosa anche disattivando temporaneamente l'antivirus. Suggerimenti? Grazie!

title: Thunderbird 102 / Phantom folders
content:
Hi,

I have some issues with phantom folders: I tried every "trick" out there but all fail to remove the phantom folders. I am running TB 102.8.0 under Arch Linux. The mail server is an exchange server accessed via IMAP.

I also used other mail clients for testing purposes. There the phantom folders are not shown, which indicates that this is a TB issue.

Note that many of these folders show up in my Trash folder.

Remove msf-files does not help, neither does compact or repair folder. Deleting the folderCache.json files also does not help. The folders persistently show up again.

Any suggestions? Thank you.

T
creator: tm2939303

title: Indicador de correo electronico recibido. | Received e-mail indicator.
content:
Uso el Thunderbird como gestor de correo y tengo varias reglas para distribuir los correos entrantes según el emisor.

Cuando recibo un correo, si el mensaje a causa de las reglas se mueve a otra carpeta que no sea la Bandeja de Entrada, el indicador de correo recibido en la barra de tareas no desaparece al abrir el correo que llegó. Para que esto ocurra debo señalar la Bandeja de Entrada. Entonces desaparece el indicador.

Intenté buscar cómo enviar esto a Mozilla, pero no conseguí encontrar ningún sitio en donde reportar fallos -suponiendo que esto lo sea-

Received e-mail indicator.

I use Thunderbird as my mail manager and I have several rules to distribute incoming mails according to the sender.

When I receive an email, if the message because of the rules is moved to a folder other than the Inbox, the received mail indicator in the taskbar does not disappear when I open the incoming mail. For this to happen, I have to point to the Inbox. Then the indicator disappears.

I tried to find out how to send this to Mozilla, but I couldn't find anywhere to report bugs -assuming this is a bug-.

title: Constant authentication failures to send IMAP Gmail via Thunderbird
content:
For some time, I have had problems sending email through Tbird, set up for IMAP to my Gmail account. I'm using 102.8.0 (32-bit) and it is set up for SSL/TLS using OAuth2. It often hangs at the stage of "sending login information", reporting eventually that it timed out. It didn't used to be that way, now it is (maybe for over a year), and I often have to retry a few times. Recently, I had to bang my head against the wall a dozen times which is more than usual, and that happened twice in the day. It could be that Google was just too busy and I should go away and try another day; but maybe y'all know about this issue and have a fix.

Thanx, Dave Odden
creator: david.odden

title: Archive location - won't archive to local folder
content:
I'm trying to archive items for an account to local storage in a single folder and maintaining the existing folder structure for the account.

That's exactly how I've set the archive options but when I archive something it is placed in an Archive folder within the account (with sub folder structure) and replicated to the IMAP server.

This works fine on other accounts where I have set the same archive options - everything is archived to the correct subfolders in the local directories.

Any help appreciated.

Thanks.

The following may or may not be related - If you look at the attached screenshots TB and the native Webmail interface are showing slightly different special folder structures. TB has Archive and Archives for this account and Junk and Spam, whereas the webmail has Archive and Junk - although also note that the content of Archive in webmail is the content of Archives in TB???

As an additional question, why, when archiving the content of inbox from any account, does this get placed in the root of the archive folder, rather than in a folder called inbox off the root. I'm sure this will have nothing to do with my issue, but having noticed it I can't see any option to control this behaviour.

title: Cannot connect with gmail account
content:
I have successfully used thunderbird for years, but cannot add my gmail account. I read the google and TB docs. I have tried this several times. I must be doing something wrong, but not clear to me…

First, I did gmail steps:

1) log into gmail using gmail.com email address and gmail password 2) click on Setting “gear” in upper right 3) click on “see all settings” 4) click on “forwarding and pop/imap” tab 5) verify that “enable imap” is checked. Says “status: imap is enabled”

Then, I did thunderbird steps:

6) clear error log. click File / New / Existing Mail Account 7) enter 3 items: my name, full gmail.com email address, and gmail password 8) check “remember password” 9) click “continue” 10) TB says “configuration found in mozilla isp database” 11) IMAP option already checked 12) click blue “done” button

Then, there were some google popups:

13) in google popup, gmail address already entered, clicked “next” 14) next popup, enter same gmail password from step 1, click “sign in” 15) receive phone call for google 2-step verification and enter code 16) next popup says “mozilla thunderbird email wants to access …” 17) popup has 3 items: email, contacts, and calendar. click “allow”

Finally, back at thunderbird, it says in a yellow box: “Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username, or password”. So fails to work.

I accessed settings / privacy / passwords / saved passwords. The list is empty. "Use a primary password" is not checked.

In case helpful, here are the messages in the error console resulting from one attempt (steps 1 to 17), with my gmail address blanked out:

XHRGEThttps://gmail.com/.well-known/autoconfig/mail/config-v1.1.xml?emailaddress=my_gmail_name@gmail.com [HTTP/2 404 Not Found 238ms] XHRPOSThttps://my_gmail_name@gmail.com:hhYY6789AA@gmail.com/autodiscover/autodiscover.xml [HTTP/2 404 Not Found 245ms] XHRGEThttps://gmail.com/.well-known/autoconfig/mail/config-v1.1.xml?emailaddress=my_gmail_name@gmail.com [HTTP/2 404 Not Found 208ms] XHRGEThttps://autoconfig.thunderbird.net/v1.1/l.google.com [HTTP/3 404 Not Found 91ms]

NS_ERROR_FAILURE: Couldn't decrypt string crypto-SDR.js:200 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] 3 OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] 2 OAuth2.jsm:170 Some cookies are misusing the recommended “SameSite“ attribute 10 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] OAuth2.jsm:170 Not showing popup notification password with the message Save login for google.com? browserRequest.js:12:13 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] 2 OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] 2 OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] 3 OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] OAuth2.jsm:170 NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Component returned failure code: 0x80004001 (NS_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED) [nsIRequest.name] OAuth2.jsm:170 Loading failed for the <script> with source “chrome://global/content/netError.js”. neterror:128:4 NS_ERROR_ABORT: User canceled primary password entry 3 crypto-SDR.js:90
